snippet: Critics of a move to raise taxes on spending call it premature, especially because it could dampen consumer activity, considered the weakest link in Japan’s nascent recovery.
abstract: Critics of Japanese move to raise national sales tax call it premature, especially because it could dampen consumer activity, considered the weakest link in Japan’s nascent recovery; increase of tax to 8 percent from 5 percent would be part of bid to rein in country's surging public debt.
lead_paragraph: Critics of a move to raise taxes on spending call it premature, especially because it could dampen consumer activity, considered the weakest link in Japan’s nascent recovery.

headline.main: Tax Increase Proposal Raises Fear of a Slowdown in Japan
headline.print_headline: Tax Increase Proposal Raises Fear of a Slowdown in Japan
